Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, ViewObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewObserver, Observer
Class client side. The client notify changes on the graphic interface only with the methods of this class. The server notify changes to the client only with "update" method of this class.
